video.title: Alaska Fish Wars
video.synopsis: Follow a group of determined fishing captains as they race to snag their share of the wild Alaskan salmon that flood Cook Inlet every summer.

episodes.synopsis: The Night's Edge's hydraulics fail three days in a row and Gavin's North Crow hits a sandbar, but the Paragon has a spectacular day in open fishing.
episodes.title: Game On

episodes.synopsis: Rookie Capt. Gavin's North Crow, Capt. Wes's Night's Edge and Capt. Dan's Paragon are among the 400 vessels heading to sea as fishing season begins.
episodes.title: All In

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Dan brings his young son along for luck, Capt. Gavin finds success in northern waters and Capt. Wes lands the day's first haul.
episodes.title: Jackpot

episodes.synopsis: As the opening day of salmon fishing season approaches, the four Cook Inlet captains each hope for a record-breaking year.
episodes.title: Rush the Line

episodes.synopsis: On their second day in Cook Inlet, the four captains each make choices that could either net them a small fortune or jeopardize their whole operation.
episodes.title: Rock the Boat

episodes.synopsis: As the season reaches its peak, the captains plan their strategies on a day that could land them up to $30,000 in salmon.
episodes.title: Into the Hot Zone

episodes.synopsis: Cook Inlet's tides wreak havoc on boats, and Taylor causes major problems when he ignores a broken drive shaft to keep fishing.
episodes.title: Against the Tide

episodes.synopsis: As salmon season begins to wind down, how the captains deal with their fatigued crews will affect their hauls ... and the safety of their boats.
episodes.title: Monster Haul

episodes.synopsis: On the final day of salmon fishing season, Capt. Wes loses an engine and Capt. Gavin rips a net, while Capt. Dino battles for a spot in prime waters.
episodes.title: Last Captain Standing
